text: “Gu ntigem ndun han ndai, gu wom kha nuianan kɨrga fhu. Mbe kha nuianan kɨrga. Dara, ndu guigira ŋgarigi, guma the ndu fara muuŋgi fhuvara. Ndu wo zɨn ŋkasŋkar panan mbe ganɨri. Ndu mba zɨ bakɨmen na nɨɨŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe wari tɨgɨp ndava bavira kɨrga. Mbe ŋkara farar muuŋgiri, ŋka wani tɨgap ndava bavira ki.
